Package pkgMain

Class DrawGardenView

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.View
pkgMain.DrawGardenView
public class DrawGardenView
extends View
Class - DrawGardenView, this class sets up the scene for building the initial garden. The user can choose to add squares and circles of a size determined by the users length entered. There are two circles A and B which the user places to indicate the length of their garden which is also used to calculate the scale of the garden.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
William Cantera, Diane Vinson, Ben Testani, Jacob Kuchma, Maria van Venrooy

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawGardenView

      public DrawGardenView​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Controller con)
      DrawGardenView, The custom constructor for the DrawGardenView. This takes in a garden and displays it on the right side of the view for the user to drag plants into.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage of this scene
      con - an instance of the controller
